site_name: Cuba Street Site, Land At North East Junction Of Manilla Street And Tobago Street, Tobago Street, London
description: Request for observations from the London Borough of Tower Hamlets for: "Erection of single tower block accommodating a high density residential led development (Use Class C3) with ancillary amenity and play space, along with the provision of a flexible retail space at ground floor (Use Class E), the provision of a new publicly accessible park and alterations to the public highway (Reference: PA/20/02128/A10This application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement.Further explanation (not forming part of the formal description of development set out above):Erection of part 52, part 32 storey building to accommodate 428 new residential units (Use Class C3) with ancillary amenity and play space, along with the provision of 97sqm of flexible retail space at ground floor (Use Class E), the creation of additional on street parking and the provision of a new publicly accessible park."
